S

Say - Class in com.twilio4j.twiml
This class directly reflects the Say verb documented at http://www.twilio.com/docs/api/twiml/say All of the descriptions included in these javadoc comments come directly from the twilio website.
Say(String) - Constructor for class com.twilio4j.twiml.Say
The 'Say' verb converts text to speech that is read back to the caller.
say(String) - Method in class com.twilio4j.twism.TwilioStateMachineServlet
Inserts a Say verb into your TwiML.
Say.Language - Enum in com.twilio4j.twiml
Enumerated languages for the language attribute.
Say.Voice - Enum in com.twilio4j.twiml
Enumerated voices for the voice attribute.
sendDigits(String) - Method in class com.twilio4j.twiml.Number
The 'sendDigits' attribute tells Twilio to play DTMF tones when the call is answered.
setAction(E) - Method in class com.twilio4j.twiml.Dial
 
setCallerId(String) - Method in class com.twilio4j.twiml.Dial
 
setHangupOnStar(Boolean) - Method in class com.twilio4j.twiml.Dial

setTimeout(Integer) - Method in class com.twilio4j.twiml.Dial
 
Sms<E extends java.lang.Enum<?>> - Class in com.twilio4j.twiml
This class directly reflects the Sms verb documented at http://www.twilio.com/docs/api/twiml/sms AND http://www.twilio.com/docs/api/twiml/sms/sms Although these are technically different, they really only differ in the request parameters that it can receive.
Sms(String) - Constructor for class com.twilio4j.twiml.Sms
The Sms verb sends an SMS message to a phone number during a phone call.
Sms() - Method in class com.twilio4j.twism.TwilioParameters
To access parameters posted by the action of the Sms verb.
sms(String) - Method in class com.twilio4j.twism.TwilioStateMachineServlet
Inserts a Sms verb into your TwiML.
SmsParameters - Interface in com.twilio4j.twism
Twilio will pass the following parameters in addition to the standard TwiML Voice request parameters with its request to the 'statusCallback' URL of Sms.
startConferenceOnEnter(boolean) - Method in class com.twilio4j.twiml.Conference
This attribute tells a conference to start when this participant joins the conference, if it is not already started.
statusCallback(E) - Method in class com.twilio4j.twiml.Sms
A callback state in the state machine.
